body: Hi, I am trying to run the GenCumulativeSkyMtx component and I was getting the error that the GenDayMtx.exe could not be downloaded. So I manually downloaded it and moved it to C:\Users\Kaley Blackstock\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug. Now it's telling me: Runtime error (FileNotFoundException): Could not find file... see attached error message. Any help is appreciated. Thanks. -Kaley [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NDILiAzzLEXe8Di8CLYSlSUW*uznI-L72Uu6W50x2BXs9Kx0G2dRnm9o3LtPlyT-vv6MiA2K2I*TRWP2WXUrERlMfx5W*hOS/ladybug_skygenerationissue.JPG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NDILiAzzLEWabAhmJTRt1CcbUnRrBnfLoOYOfF2RF1kmpxpLZrddH*aImpKK4XGyBV3mxWf06MNKheD5-GxzsIZmV7tYyu5Z/ladybug_skygenerationissue.JPG)

replies.body:
Hi Kaley,

This is because of the white space in the filepath. Create a new folder manually (with no whitespace), copy gendaymtx.exe to that folder and set workingDir_ to that folder and everything should work fine.

Sorry for the inconvenience. We will fix the issue with white space for the next release.

-Mostapha
